response.original_title: Signing Time Vol 1 My First Signs
response.overview: From their magical animated treehouse, Alex (age 3), his cousin Leah (age 4) who is deaf, and host Rachel Coleman (Leah's mom) teach beginning American Sign Language (ASL) signs with your child in a fun and playful way. Created for ages 1-8 but enjoyed by all! Closed captioned. Approx. 30 minutes, plus special features.
response.title: Signing Time Vol 1 My First Signs
